mapper.insert: insert into GQPYXSJB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SSSS, SSQX, YXMC, FHZT, TRRL, LYQD, BXML, CZLBZ, KJQDCSC, KJQDCSPHI) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trrl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lyqd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bxml,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{czlbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kjqdcsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{kjqdcsphi,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SSSS, SSQX, YXMC, FHZT, TRRL, LYQD, BXML, CZLBZ, KJQDCSC, KJQDCSPHI from GQPYXSJB
